title: New Website Launch
excerpt: Lorna Jennings’ official author website is now live — with direct paperback sales and first-chapter samplers.
body: We’re delighted to launch Lorna’s new home on the web. Readers can now buy paperbacks directly and join the mailing list for news, events, and exclusive excerpts. Thanks for being here!

title: Belfast Signing & Q&A
excerpt: Join Lorna for a reading and Q&A at No Alibis Bookstore, Belfast.
